history.narrative: Law 9-73 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 9-352. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 5, 1991, and December 3, 1991, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 20, 1991, it was assigned Act No. 9-125 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
